meanings.definition: The price of a ticket for travel on an airplane.
meanings.sent1: The airfares for the trip were quite expensive.
meanings.sent2: I always compare airfares before booking a flight.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot joked that his airfares were too high to fly.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared high like airfares on a busy holiday weekend.
meanings.sent5: The neon sign advertised cheap airfares, attracting many travelers.

meanings.definition: The cost of flying on an airplane.
meanings.sent1: Airfares can vary depending on the time of year.
meanings.sent2: She saved money by booking her airfares in advance.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's only weakness was high airfares for his private jet.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed was as strong as the airfares to his dream destination.
meanings.sent5: The sudden increase in airfares left many passengers frustrated.
